website_summaries.verdict: Basic slip-on shoe covers protect shoes from spills and splashes.
pros: Fits wide range of shoe and boot sizes
Ideal for quick visits to open houses, inspections, and site visits
Easy to put on and remove
Good traction and easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Inside home protection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 1-2 time use. Have on hand for people coming in to do work in my home. Most workers don’t have & cannot work here without them. No one minds putting on so far. Outside dirt not good for carpets. Size runs slightly smaller than stated.
customer_reviews.author: Bling4

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality, some of them got ripped just after putting them on. There's also only 10 pairs. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: LaMujerDeAlejandro

customer_reviews.title: Be careful and buy another one...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I need to say that the product has 10 pairs of the covers. It is not stated anywhere in the description. But it has the same price as 100 pairs shoe covers, so I thought I will receive the same amount of covers, but I didn't. So, be careful... As with the size, they are like medium, not so big not so snug, depending on your shoe size, obviously. But they are not as durable, so be careful again. Bottom line, buy another shoe covers...
customer_reviews.author: Can Sarisozen

customer_reviews.title: They tear very easily. After one days use (in the one building
customer_reviews.text: They tear very easily. After one days use (in the one building, in door), they were worn out and ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mejias

customer_reviews.title: Handy way to keep your floor clean
customer_reviews.text: I keep a bundle of these by the back door and the front door to hand to the service people and other folks who refuse to remove their shoes when coming in my house. The only company that provides their own that I've dealt with is Comcast. So these really come in handy. They don't fit really big feet, though.
customer_reviews.author: CBA

customer_reviews.title: They stayed on the foot and the elastic wasn't easily breakable.
customer_reviews.text: Surface Shields worked as expected. They stayed on the foot and the elastic wasn't easily breakable.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe cover
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe cover. Easy to put on and take off. Provides traction when working in homes with wood flooring. I would certainly purchase these shoe covers again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't even hold up on carpet and hardwood floors ...
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't even hold up on carpet and hardwood floors..how is it gonna last in a construction area only reason giving it a one star is cause it requires it
customer_reviews.author: Billy Farley

customer_reviews.title: Too small for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I could fit it over my boot cast, but thay were too small. I will find a better use for them now that the cast it off.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hagel

customer_reviews.title: good for indoor/outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: these shoe covers are more durable than I thought. i am glad i bought them. appear to be very sturdy, you can wear them for a long time. only downside is they cant really be streched to fit over boots.
customer_reviews.author: Cyanogen

customer_reviews.title: Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: It's almost too snug of a fit over your shoes, but it works (after you struggle a little to put it on).
customer_reviews.author: Kdawg99

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and Small
customer_reviews.text: The ones I buy at the local hardware store are a bit larger and sturdier. These brake too easily and they are not large enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

product_meta.title: Surface Shields 022-SC3001PB Cloth Shoe Covers-10 Pairs, 14-1/2 in Large x 5-1/4 in W, One-Size
product_meta.description:
Protect flooring and footwear with Surface Shields brand shoe covers. Cloth covers are perfect to protect flooring from dirt, scuffs, and skids during all types of indoor projects. All covers are lightweight, breathable, and feature an elastic closure.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Protect your floor or carpet from dirt, scuffs, and heel marks with our slip-on SHOE COVERS. Easy to use shoe covers are perfect for general construction work, open houses, as well as during inspections. Shoe covers are lightweight and disposable. One size fits all.
feature_bullets: Protects floors from dirt, scuffs, and heel marks
Includes 10 pairs of cloth shoe covers

specifications.Size: 14-1/2 in Large x 5-1/4 in W, One-Size
specifications.Included Components: Surface Shields 022-SC3001PB Cloth Shoe Covers - 10 Pairs
